Module 1

##Modeling Building Elements

This module serves as a good introduction to the concepts of host elements such as walls and wall hosted elements such as doors and windows. With these key underpinnings you should feel confident in developing your own BIM models applying these concepts.

Exercise 1 Modeling Exterior and Interior Walls

Exercise 2 Adding Doors and Windows

Exercise 3 Creating Floors and Roofs
